snippet: The Emmy-winning writer, director and comedian, who is one of the producers of the upcoming Netflix film “Pee-wee’s Big Holiday,” sketches his responses to a brief questionnaire.
abstract: Illustrated interview with writer, director and comedian Judd Apatow, who helped produce Netflix film Pee-wee's Big Holiday.
lead_paragraph: The Emmy-winning writer, director and comedian, who is one of the producers of the upcoming Netflix film “Pee-wee’s Big Holiday,” sketches his responses to a brief questionnaire.
